text:

text:
Ant version 1.1 ? really ? and what's your Java version ? os ? windows I 
suppose ?

Look into ant.bat or ant.sh, the compiler is in tools.jar which location 
should be JAVA_HOME\lib\tools.jar

Setting as invalid because of incomplete information. Feel free to reopen if 
it still persist but please give accurate and detailed information.
